summary: After a break up, Jenny moves in with writer Kelly, her filmmaker husband, and their child. Despite a rocky start, Jenny's influence helps Kelly realize that an evolution in her life, career and relationship is necessary for her happiness.
cast: Anna Kendrick|Melanie Lynskey|Mark Webber|Lena Dunham|Joe Swanberg|Jude Swanberg|Chris Swanson|Eldar Kim|Megan Mercier|Chris Renton|Kris Rey|Jessica Angelos|Mike Brune|Harry Burton|Tony Castro|Ethan DeCota|Van Eggers|Matt Feasley|Sara Gaare|Elizabeth Hale|Traci Hercher|Megan Hovany|Charlotte Keenan|Maggie Peterson|Felix Pineiro|Fae Rabin|Ben Schwartz|Ezra Teitelbaum|Kate Thomas|Erin Vogel|Michael Wawzenek|Mr. Schneider
keywords: alcoholic|family relationships|written by director|husband wife relationship|toddler
title: Happy Christmas
